headline: Tech Weekly podcast: iPad 3 rumours and Raspberry Pi
text: We sift through the rumours about Apple's two potential new products, the next version of the iPad, and Apple TV.  Chris Cross joins us to look at another new release, the Raspberry Pi  is it a modern version of the BBC Micro?  Charles looks back at the big lessons from last week's Mobile World Congress, and talks to EU Commissioner for Justice, Fundamental Rights and Citizenship Viviane Reding about Google and privacy.
